text: Sri Lanka competed at the 1980 Summer Olympics in Moscow, USSR. From 1948 to 1972, the nation was known as Ceylon at the Olympic Games. ==Athletics== Men's 4×400 metres Relay * Dharmasena Samararatne, Kosala Sahabandu, Newton Perera, and Appunidage Premachandra :* Heat -- 3:14.4 (→ did not advance) ==References== *Official Olympic Reports *Sri Lanka at the 1980 Moscow Summer Games Category:Nations at the 1980 Summer Olympics 1980 Category:1980 in Sri Lankan sport
title: Sri Lanka at the 1980 Summer Olympics
